name: Bro Hook Wingovers
description: Wingover but in Bro Hook position. Both pilots must stay connected during the manoeuvre until the gliders stabilise. Series of pendulum turns with change of direction each time
minimum: twice to one side, twice to the other side with 135Â° angle

criterias.normal: rhythm, flow, trajectory, angle (the higher the better)
criterias.twisted: one pilot has to stay twisted from entry until exit
